comment: Congratulations to and his campaign bc , if I am not mistaken , the person who has led this poll has gone on to be nominee in last six cycles . Leading this poll is momentous .
amr:
# ::snt Congratulations to and his campaign bc , if I am not mistaken , the person who has led this poll has gone on to be nominee in last six cycles . Leading this poll is momentous .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / congratulate-01
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (h / he)
                  :op2 (c2 / campaign-01
                        :ARG0 h))
            :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (g / go-on-15
                        :ARG1 (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (l / lead-02
                                    :ARG1 (p2 / poll-01
                                          :mod (t / this))))
                        :purpose (n / nominate-01
                              :ARG1 p)
                        :condition (m2 / mistake-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG0 (ii / i))
                        :time (c4 / cycle
                              :quant 6
                              :mod (l2 / last)))))
      :snt2 (m3 / momentous
            :domain (l3 / lead-02
                  :ARG1 (p3 / poll-01
                        :mod (t2 / this)))))

comment: Am I missing something ? Why the congrats ? I respect you and your opinion but Bernie and his supporters helped get Trump elected . I will never forgive them for their hatred toward HRC . They chose Trump instead of HRC . I hope he doesn t win the election .
